page.title: 15Tourism in Guildtown Area
page.content:
There is an Inn in the village of Guildtown. It is called The Anglers' Rest and it, with two private houses doing Bed and Breakfast, is the only provision for tourists.
The Inn, as the local people call it, has accomodation for ten tourists in five bedrooms. All meals can be provided.
The Inn is on the Main Road and is therefore well situated for those travelling between Perth and the north towards Braemar and Aberdeen.
Anyone holidaying in Guildtown would probably go fishing in the nearby River Tay_ (which is not, however in our designated map reference.)
